name: Bloody Glimpse
description:
WHAT IS BLOODY GLIMPSE?
BLOODY GLIMPSE is a chaotic first person shooter that confronts heavily armed players with the most horrifying night creatures - Gargoyles.THE SETTING
The world of Bloody Glimpse is set during second world war times, in Africa, with weapons specific to this time period.THE PLOT
The story starts somewhere in the middle of the desert, when during the night recon, your whole team just disappears one by one. As the only survivor, as soon as the sun goes up, you set on a mission to find your missing buddies.FEATURES
Variety of creatures to shoot and dice, ranging from small, thorough medium up to tough as hell Gargoyles and derivatives.

Multiple bosses to defeat with second world war specific arsenal of weapons.

Bloody Glimpse will take you on a immersive journey through bloody and dark world, the one that you always dreamed of.
